T02D1295:185b-0: @185b # // rgya gar skad du ba lim bi dhi: bod skad du /
T02D1295:185b-1: gtor ma'i cho ga / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1295:185b-2: bgegs rnams 'tshe ba zhi bya dang //
T02D1295:185b-3: las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1295:185b-4: 'byung po thams cad gtor ma dag / sbyin pa'i cho ga yang dag bri //
T02D1295:185b-5: de la dang po rnal 'byor pa stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1295:185b-6: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dha rm'a: sva bh'a ba shu ddho& ham /
T02D1295:185b-7: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di lan gsum du yongs su bzlas te /
T02D1295:185b-8: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa la lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1295:185b-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'tma ko& ham /
T02D1295:185b-10: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do //
T02D1295:185b-11: khams gsum po thog ma nas ma skyes shing rang
T02D1295:185b-12: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par mi rtog pa
T02D1295:185b-13: / gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam su dmigs la //
T02D1295:185b-14: nam mkha'i khams rgya chen po'i dbus su /
T02D1295:185b-15: chos 'byung gi phyag rgya gyen du gnas par rnam par bsgom zhig /
T02D1295:185b-16: de'i dbus na sna tshogs padma rgya chen po dang /
T02D1295:185b-17: zla ba la sogs pa'i skyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D1295:185b-18: rang gi yi dam gyi lha'i rnal 'byor bskyed par
T02D1295:185b-19: bya'o // de'i 'og tu snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D1295:185b-20: 'kro ba ma lus pa snang bar byas pa sdon
T02D1295:185b-21: du 'gro ba can gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen
T02D1295:185b-22: po'i bdag po gzugs na spyod pa tshangs pa la
T02D1295:185b-23: sogs pa dang / dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang /
T02D1295:185b-24: zla ba dang nyi ma dang nye dbang la sogs 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /
T02D1295:185b-25: mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /
T02D1295:185b-26: thags bzangs ris dang sa'i lha la sogs pa dang /
T02D1295:185b-27: klu la sogs pa sems can yang dag par drags te /
T02D1295:185b-28: chos 'byung gi dbus su rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1295:185b-29: de la dang por steng gi phyogs kyi //
T02D1295:185b-30: gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa'i lha //
T02D1295:185b-31: ral pa cod pan dag dang dkar //
T02D1295:185b-32: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang //
T02D1295:185b-33: 'od zer dkar po phred bar ldan //
T02D1295:185b-34: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi //
T02D1295:185b-35: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug sogs //
T02D1295:185b-36: lha rnams rin chen cod pan 'chang //
T02D1295:185b-37: sna tshogs rgyan dang 'od ldan pa'o //
T02D1295:185b-38: steng gi nyi zla sogs de bzhin //
T02D1295:185b-39: rang rang phyogs kyi phyogs bdag po //
T02D1295:186a-0: @186a * // rang rang mdog dang phyag mtshan sogs //
T02D1295:186a-1: ldan pa go rims bzhin du bsgom //
T02D1295:186a-2: thags bzangs ris dang sa la sogs //
T02D1295:186a-3: klu yi bdag po brgyad rnams kyang //
T02D1295:186a-4: rang gi ye shes sems snying ga'i //
T02D1295:186a-5: sa bon las byung rigs gsum gyis //
T02D1295:186a-6: ye shes rnam par snang mdzad sogs //
T02D1295:186a-7: gzugs su rim gyis bsgrub par bya //
T02D1295:186a-8: de la da ni sems can thams cad yongs su
T02D1295:186a-9: sbyong bar byed pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ste
T02D1295:186a-10: / rang gis ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa
T02D1295:186a-11: bon las zla ba bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D1295:186a-12: yi ge aom mdog dkar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1295:186a-13: / la gnas pa / 'od kun nas 'phro ba mgo bo'i steng du rnam par bsams la /
T02D1295:186a-14: de'i 'od zer gyis tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs
T02D1295:186a-15: na spyod pa'i lha rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D1295:186a-17: de'i 'og tu rang gi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs
T02D1295:186a-18: ga'i sa bon de nyid las rnal 'byor pa'i yi
T02D1295:186a-19: ge h'um nor bu mthon ka'i mdog can la nor
T02D1295:186a-21: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1295:186a-23: 'od zer sprin des bkug nas ni //
T02D1295:186a-24: 'dod na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1295:186a-25: 'jig rten skyod pa sbyang byas te //
T02D1295:186a-26: sangs rgyas mi bskyod gzugs dag tu //
T02D1295:186a-27: grub par yongs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1295:186a-28: de ma thag tu rang gis ye shes sems dpa'i
T02D1295:186a-29: thugs ka de nyid las yi ge aa dmar po
T02D1295:186a-30: 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs rab tu 'phro ba zla
T02D1295:186a-32: kun nas spros pa de'i 'od zer dmar po spros pas thags bzangs ris dang /
T02D1295:186a-34: klu'i rgyal po brgyad yongs su sbyangs te /
T02D1295:186a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnam par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1295:186a-36: 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas
T02D1295:186a-37: pa de dag thams cad rang gi rigs kyi de
T02D1295:186a-38: bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bsgrub pa de la gzugs
T02D1295:186a-39: na spyod pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
T02D1295:186a-40: par snang mdzad kyi rigs so //
T02D1295:186a-41: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02D1295:186a-42: 'jig rten rnams ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs so //
T02D1295:186a-43: thags bzangs ris la sogs pa rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs so //
T02D1295:186b-0: de bas na @186b gzugs na spyod pa la sogs
T02D1295:186b-1: pa nas klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi bar de dag
T02D1295:186b-2: rang rang gi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
T02D1295:186b-3: su bsgrubs la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
T02D1295:186b-4: mgo bo la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar byas la /
T02D1295:186b-5: de dag gis lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1295:186b-6: de nas de rnams kyi mdun du bza' ba dang
T02D1295:186b-7: bca' ba la sogs pa'i dngos po ci 'byor pa
T02D1295:186b-8: btsal la / dang por yam yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1295:186b-9: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu rgyal mtshan
T02D1295:186b-10: gyis mtshan pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D1295:186b-11: de'i steng du ram dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1295:186b-12: me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum rab tu 'bar ba'i gzugs
T02D1295:186b-13: can dang / de'i steng du yi ge aa yongs
T02D1295:186b-14: su gyur pa'i ka p'a la yongs su bsgoms la
T02D1295:186b-15: can dang / / ka p'a la de'i dbus su bdud rtsi lnga /
T02D1295:186b-16: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon byin gyis brlab par bsams la /
T02D1295:186b-17: de'i 'og tu sbar ba dang dros pa la sogs pa'i cho gas yang dag par bsgrubs la /
T02D1295:186b-18: yi ge aom gyis byin gyis brlabs par blta'o //
T02D1295:186b-19: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las grub pa'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02D1295:186b-20: de nas yi ge aom gyi 'od zer gyis de
T02D1295:186b-21: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud
T02D1295:186b-22: rtsi drangs nas / bdud rtsi lnga po de'i steng du rab tu bstims la /
T02D1295:186b-23: de ma thag tu 'bar ba dang dros pa dang /
T02D1295:186b-24: yi ge aom dang rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur par bsams la /
T02D1295:186b-26: de ltar bsgrubs pa'i bdud rtsi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1295:186b-27: tshogs thams cad kyi ljags rdo rje las 'phros pa'i
T02D1295:186b-28: 'od zer gyi sbu gus rab tu drangs pas tshim
T02D1295:186b-29: par bya'o // de nas rdo rje dang dril bu yang dag par blangs te /
T02D1295:186b-30: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags kyis dngos
T02D1295:186b-31: po de dag lan bdun gyi bar du byin gyis
T02D1295:186b-32: brlabs la / de nas de rnams la dbul te /
T02D1295:186b-33: rdo rje myur du gsor byas nas //
T02D1295:186b-34: rdo rje sbyor nas kun brtags kyi //
T02D1295:186b-35: ri bo thams cad nges bsal bya //
T02D1295:186b-36: de nas dril bu gsil byas la //
T02D1295:186b-37: rgyal bas stong nyid rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
T02D1295:186b-38: mchog tu dgyes pa'i sgra yis ni //
T02D1295:186b-39: tshigs bcad 'di ni lan gsum brjod //
T02D1295:186b-40: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D1295:187a-1: bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni sgrub par byed //
T02D1295:187a-2: de la gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1295:187a-3: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'a ta /
T02D1295:187a-4: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1295:187a-5: de kho na nyid kyi sngags 'di lan gsum mam bdun brjod do //
T02D1295:187a-6: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dag ni //
T02D1295:187a-7: rjes dran gtor ma byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1295:187a-8: ji ltar bdud rtsi ro dag gis //
T02D1295:187a-9: de ltar thams cad tshim par bya //
T02D1295:187a-11: bzod bya gshegs su gsol bar bya //
T02D1295:187a-12: de la gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1295:187a-13: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1295:187a-14: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1295:187a-15: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D1295:187a-16: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1295:187a-18: skye ba med dang 'gag pa med //
T02D1295:187a-19: thog ma nas ni rang bzhin dag /'gro kun 'di dag mthong nas ni //
T02D1295:187a-20: gshegs chen 'di ni bya ba yin //
T02D1295:187a-21: gtor sbyin cho ga legs bris nas //
T02D1295:187a-22: bdag gis bsod nams gang gnyer bsags //
T02D1295:187a-24: rdzogs pa'i byang chub snod 'gyur shog / bham ga lar skyes dge slong ni //
T02D1295:187a-25: mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis //
T02D1295:187a-26: bla ma mnyes las thob gyur pa //
T02D1295:187a-27: gtor ma 'di nyid rab tu bshad //
T02D1295:187a-28: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga /
T02D1295:187a-29: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes
